MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the FK8 and FK9 postcode areas of Stirling, affecting properties in Ladysneuk Road and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4.01pm. Our control centre will attempt to reset the network remotely to restore power in stages, and our emergency response team have arrived at the local area to investigate and repair the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6.15pm. When we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated 5.26pm on Thursday 21st January 2021.
